quotes.quote: A father is a fellow who has replaced the currency in his wallet with snapshots of his kids.
Being a father is the most rewarding thing a man whose career has plateaued can do.
Every father should remember one day his son will follow his example, not his advice.
Fathers are biological necessities, but social accidents.
What the father kept silent the son speaks out.
A father is a man who expects his son to be as good a man as he meant to be.
It is a wise father that knows his own child.
The greatest mark of a father is how he treats his children when no one is looking.
A family needs a father to anchor it.
An angry father is most cruel towards himself.
It is much easier to become a father than to be one.
No love is greater than that of a father for His son.
Good fathers not only tell us how to live, they show us.
A father carries pictures where his money used to be.
One father is more than a hundred schoolmasters.
A father is a man who fails every day.
A father's disappointment can be a very powerful tool.
The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
Fathers have a lot to do to make up for having sons.
Being a father makes everything in the world make sense.
Real Fathers are men of integrity & honour. Their word is their bond.
A successful father is not more successful than his children.
A father knows his child's heart, as only a child can know his fathers.
The love of a father is one of nature's greatest masterpieces.
Real fathers are solution providers and not a part of the problem to be solved.
Be the best father you can be to your children. Because nothing is more important.
A father's duty is to make his home a place of happiness and joy.
Every father knows at once too much and too little about his own son.
A righteous father protects his children with his time and presence.
A father is the template of a man Nature gives a girl.
